personal.name: Your Name
personal.title: MERN Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Passionate about building scalable web applications with focus on backend development for innovative product teams

about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate MERN Stack Developer with strong foundations in building scalable web applications. Currently working at Accenture, I'm eager to transition to a product-based startup where I can contribute to innovative solutions and grow with cutting-edge technologies.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in creating robust, user-centric applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, with a focus on backend development. My experience includes developing RESTful APIs, implementing authentication systems, database design, and building scalable full-stack applications. I also have strong foundations in Data Structures and Algorithms, which helps me write efficient, optimized code and solve complex programming challenges.

contact.title: Let's work together!
contact.description: I'm actively seeking opportunities in product-based startups where I can contribute to innovative solutions and grow with cutting-edge technologies. Despite being early in my career, I bring strong technical foundations and a passion for learning. Let's discuss how I can add value to your team!
